title: We Need Your Help Clearing This Autism Teacher's Wish List
description:
JESSE SCALIA FROM ARBOR CREEK ELEMENTARY
This is Jesse's third year teaching kids with Autism. To get this new program up and running, she greatly needs games, toys, books, learning materials!
Will you please help Jesse Scalia out by buying one or two items off her classroom wish list? THANK YOU Bert Show Fam!
We'll feature another teacher tomorrow - it could be you! Leave us a voicemail and let us know how you need help: 1-844-827-8368.
See past featured teachers, here!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
